bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Egypt and the Sudan in the Years 1986-1987 (Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology, University of Warsaw).
bibl.note: Egypt: Alexandria, Tell Atrib, Cairo, Saqqara, Naqlun, Medum, Deir el-Bahari. - The Sudan: Old Dongola, Kadero.
DASZEWSKI Wiktor A., Archaeological Research in Egypt and the Sudan in the Years 1986-1987 (Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology, University of Warsaw).
